scenario_text.value: I’m glad the professor was all right.

Yeah. I’m not sure I’d call that “all right,”
though.

We know that Saki and Shuuji are out there.
We just need to find them!
Yeah! We’ll see this through to the end!

Hey, Takuma?
Aren’t those footprints over there?
Huh? Where?
Over there, in the grass.
(I can’t see the prints Minoru is looking at.)
How did you find them?
Are they really there?
How did you find them? I can’t see them...
I think I can see them...
Me too. But it’s more of a feeling...
Sorry. I saw them through my phone’s camera.
See?
Are they really there?

This isn’t the time for lies!
They’re really there!
But they’re totally invisible?
Another prank?
Why are you so suspicious?

You can see it through the camera!
Just look!

It’s a bit hard to make out from here, I guess?
Maybe try a close-up...

(I can definitely see the footprints on
Minoru’s screen.)
(I’ll try my <color=#B41919>camera</color>, too.)
See? Doesn’t that look like footprints?
(I’ll try my camera, too.)
